Recommended for horizontal: 1200 x 627px. For square: 1200 x 1200px. For vertical: 1080 x 1350px. Max file size: 5MB for images. Use sRGB color profile. Frame rates from 10 to 60 fps. Bit rates from 192 kbps (audio) to 30 Mbps (video). Audio: AAC or MPEG4. Video: H.264. Vertical video supported but generally displayed cropped in feed. Introductory text: up to 600 chars. Headline: 200 chars (70 recommended).
Minimum 2 cards, maximum 10 cards. Max file size: 10MB per image. Introductory text: 255 chars (150 recommended). Headline: 45 chars for landing page CTA, 30 chars for Lead Gen Form CTA.

Message subject: 60 chars max. CTA button copy: 20 chars max. No character limits for body message, but keep concise. Optional banner creative: 300x250px.
